channel.title: Avatars:
channel.description:
I have posted this because avatars look cool and iv been looking at some people comments and they said ("We should be able to make an avatar") i am asking the staff to let us have avatars it would be awsome i got some cool things to use for avatars (or you can make it a created one by staff only) non-matter
-------------------some avatar idea's i have made incase we get the right's--------------------------------
1. [img]http://static.desktopnexus.com/avatars/REAPPER.jpg[/img]
2. [img]http://img396.imageshack.us/img396/4031/kittah4gy9.jpg[/img]
3. [img]http://ea-warhammer.com/media/conceptArt/full/KnightOfTzeentch.jpg[/img]
4. [img]http://www.sevenforums.com/attachments/customization/13626d1244451820-custom-avatars-homer.jpg[/img]
5. [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_pcH9tHOhKF4/SBy02Rrq4iI/AAAAAAAAAgM/FAPtnYgecKk/s400/happy-face.gif[/img]
6. [img]http://blogs.fayobserver.com/techsassy/files/2008/10/sad-face.jpg[/img]
------------------------I also found some cool avatars even if the staff say "Nope"--------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@Pokemon photo's for *Rich*@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
1. [img]http://www.eatnata.info/images/wmwallpapers/Pokemon-1.jpeg[/img]
2. [img]http://www.play-free-online-games.com/listmachine/uploads/image_pokemon_indigo_1.jpg[/img]
3. [img]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3028/2843991814_99ff89bc4c.jpg[/img] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------If you want to share you favorite picture or avatar post it here :)-------------------------------------- -------------------------My favorite picture in the world---------------------------------------------------------- [img]http://truth-is.org/yahoo_site_admin/assets/images/How_We_Balance_the_Power_of_God%27s_Law-_Quest_253212654_std.258151550_std.jpg[/img] Not really my favorite i just coulden't really find anything els best i could find :)
Hope you like this staff :) AND ALSO post your favorite or funniest picture haha...
:) :D :cool: ;D :o :rolleyes: :D :) :D :cool: ;D :o :rolleyes: :D :) :D :cool: ;D :o :rolleyes: :D :) :) :)

item.title: Avatars:
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“1336.9, post:14, topic:305088”]wow so you mean this forum is run by 8 year olds who arent allowd to watch naked girls?
so what if someone puts in 1 big deal.

you should put this in the quiz thing:

Q:Whats the only forum that doesnt allow avatars:

MoparScape / right answer
/random forum/ wrong answer
/random forum/ wrong answer
/random forum/ wrong answer
/random forum/ wrong answer[/quote]

There are multiple reasons why avatars aren’t allowed. It’s not a big deal anyway, the forum looks much cleaner without them.

also, you’re an idiot

OP, this has been discussed many times, it’s not going to happen. Also for future reference, if you have any suggestions, post them in the sticky.

Read full topic
